title: DeepSeek
content: DeepSeek is a Chinese company that creates open-source AI models. It is based in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, and was founded in 2023 by Liang Wenfeng, who is also the CEO. The company is funded by the Chinese hedge fund High-Flyer.

title: Liang Wenfeng Biography: Age, Education, Net worth, Wiki
content:
ProfileLiang Wenfeng Biography: Age, Education, Net worth, Wiki Mani Verma

Liang Wenfeng
Liang Wenfeng, born in 1985, is a 39-year-old expert in artificial intelligence (AI) and finance. He has made significant contributions to the fields of AI and finance, leveraging his expertise to solve complex problems and drive innovation. Liang’s journey from a coastal city in southern China to becoming a key player in the global AI industry is a testament to his dedication, intelligence, and vision.

Growing up in Zhanjiang, Guangdong Province, Liang was encouraged by his father, a primary school teacher, to pursue education and problem-solving. This early influence shaped his future endeavors and laid the foundation for his success. Liang’s academic achievements and professional milestones have made him a prominent figure in the tech and finance sectors.
